description:
Mindshow Chief Operating Officer

Mindshow is a dynamic and rapidly growing software company dedicated to revolutionizing the way 3D animation is created and shared. Our platform empowers creators with innovative tools that make storytelling in 3D animation more accessible and engaging. We are looking for a strategic and experienced Chief Operating Officer (COO) to join our leadership team. This is a new role designed to support our continued growth and expansion.

The COO will be responsible for overseeing the company’s day-to-day operations, ensuring efficient and effective processes are in place to drive performance and achieve strategic goals. The COO will work closely with the CEO and other senior executives to develop and implement strategies that enhance productivity, operational excellence, and overall company growth. A critical focus will be on Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A), software licensing, and pricing strategies.

This role is based onsite in Downtown Los Angeles, CA.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Operational Leadership:
  • Lead and manage the operational functions of the company, including customer support, human resources, and administration
  • Develop and implement operational policies and procedures that improve efficiency and effectiveness across all non-technical departments
  • Strategic Planning:
  • Collaborate with the CEO and executive team to develop and execute Mindshow’s strategic plan
  • Identify opportunities for growth and improvement, and drive initiatives to achieve business objectives
  • Financial Management & FP&A:
  • Oversee budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning processes
  • Develop and maintain robust financial models to support business decision-making
  • Analyze financial performance and provide strategic recommendations to improve profitability
  • Software Licensing & Pricing:
  • Develop and implement software licensing strategies to maximize revenue
  • Lead pricing strategy development, including competitive analysis and market positioning
  • Ensure compliance with licensing agreements and manage relationships with key stakeholders
  • Team Development:
  • Build, lead, and mentor a high-performing team
  • Foster a positive and inclusive company culture that promotes employee engagement and development
  • Performance Monitoring:
  • Establish and track key performance indicators (KPIs) to monitor and improve operational performance
  • Regularly report on operational performance to the CEO and board of directors
  • Risk Management:
  • Identify and mitigate operational risks
  • Ensure compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards

Qualifications:

  • Proven experience as a COO or in a similar senior operational role within a software or technology company
  • Strong understanding of business functions such as HR, finance, marketing, and sales
  • Demonstrated experience in strategic planning and business development
  • Excellent organizational and leadership abilities
  • Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills
  • Strong problem-solving and decision-making capabilities
  • Experience with scaling operations in a high-growth environment is highly desirable
  • Expertise in FP&A, software licensing, and pricing strategies
  • Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Finance, or a related field (MBA or other relevant advanced degree preferred)

Why Join Us:

  • Opportunity to shape and drive the growth of a dynamic and innovative company
  • Collaborative and inclusive work environment
  • Competitive salary and benefits package
  • Career growth and development opportunities

Mindshow is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

The salary range for this role is $175,000 - $225,000 annually.
